extendedInfo.description: Lightning fast 3D Graphics in this Beautiful Challenging Arcade Style Racing game...Steer your luge using the phones tilt sensor tap screen to push off..To gain Speed, keep to the racing line the lower the better if you go off the racing line i.e Up Hill you will loose speed and eventually stop..If you do stop tap screen to push off..Race the full WSLA session ... Post your times against the rest of the world in,Tournament mode .Advance to new tracks by beating the Qualification time.. If you Qualify you will earn cash that can be used to upgrade your luge(in Pro Version)..Failure to Qualify will result in loss of Cash if you lose all your cash the game is over..if you complete the full WSLA Session you will beentered in with the Elite players...In Practice mode you can race all tracks(in Pro version)and compare your times against the rest of the world

reviews.comment: Incredibly boring, graphics are terrible, and low-tech would be an understatement. Too many bugs. I\'m deleting.
